faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is Sharjah Media City?
items.answer: Sharjah Media City (SHAMS) is a free zone located in Sharjah, UAE, boasting state-of-the-art facilities for creatives. The region offers numerous benefits, including full foreign ownership, tax exemptions, and strategic access to global markets.

items.question: What types of legal entities can I set up in SHAMS?
items.answer: Sharjah Media City allows businesses to choose from 3 options: SHAMS LLC, a branch of a foreign company, or a branch of a local company.

items.question: Do I need to rent or lease a physical office to set up in SHAMS?
items.answer: No, you can explore alternative options, such as flex-desk, virtual, or co-working spaces, or launch fully remote to slash overheads.

items.question: What documents do I need to set up a business in Sharjah Media City?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need copies of your passport, an incorporation certificate, and other identification documents, depending on your selected business structure and license.

items.question: Can I set up my SHAMS business fully remote?
items.answer: Yes, our experts can help you launch your business in SHAMS without being physically present in the UAE.
